name: Inlet duct choking / Material build-up / Ring formation in cyclone cone
diagnostics: Material build-up reduces separation and flow stability.
recommendation: Stabilize upstream conditions, Trim feed, optimize draft, plan safe inspection and schedule safe cleaning

name: String 1 material build-up/ Ring formation in cyclone cone/ cyclone jamming
diagnostics: Inlet duct choking / Material build-up in cyclone cone, possibility of cyclone jamming
recommendation: Inspect and clean string 1 material build-up/ cyclone jamming

name: String 2 material build-up/ Ring formation in cyclone cone/ cyclone jamming
diagnostics: Inlet duct choking / Material build-up in cyclone cone, possibility of cyclone jamming
recommendation: Inspect and clean string 2 material build-up/ cyclone jamming

name: Preheater Fan Speed Fluctuation
diagnostics: Preheater Fan Speed Fluctuation
recommendation: Preheater Fan issue, VFD fault

name: Preheater Fan Bearing Temperature High
diagnostics: Fan inefficiency, overload, bearing damage, excess/ lack of lubrication
recommendation: Reduce load, Inspect fan bearings, Check coupling, check bearing lubrication

name: Preheater Fan Motor Bearing Temperature High
diagnostics: Fan inefficiency, overload, bearing damage, excess/ lack of lubrication
recommendation: Reduce load, Inspect fan bearings, Check coupling, check bearing lubrication

name: Preheater Fan Winding Temperature High
diagnostics: Fan inefficiency, overload, bearing issue, winding heating
recommendation: Reduce load, Inspect fan bearings, Check coupling, check cooling water temperature, check for any mechanical/ electrical overloads

name: Preheater fan high vibrations
diagnostics: Imbalance, bearing wear
recommendation: Inspect bearings, Balance fan, misalignment, Check coupling, Schedule preventive maintenance

name: Precalciner pressure abnormal conditions
diagnostics: No proper hot gas circulation through calciner. Impacting residence time
recommendation: Check preheater fan status, speed and Inspect Calciner duct, false air ingress

name: Precalciner pressure abnormal conditions (range)
diagnostics: No proper hot gas circulation through calciner. Impacting residence time
recommendation: Check preheater fan status, speed and Inspect Calciner duct, false air ingress

name: CO/O2 limit breach in precalciner
diagnostics: Incompleted combustion of calciner fuel
recommendation: Monitor air flow and fuel firing rate in calciner

name: Precalciner fuel supply malfunctioning
diagnostics: Fuel feed inconsistency
recommendation: Troubleshoot rotary feeder and coal conveying blower, monitor firing rate in calciner, Check moisture content in coal

name: Inefficient calcination in precalciner
diagnostics: Under-calcination due to low temperature, poor heat transfer and residence time, air-fuel imbalance.
recommendation: Inspect preheater fan speed, Monitor Kiln tertiary temperature, Kiln and precalciner fuel firing rate

name: Inefficient calcination in precalciner (less fuel firing)
diagnostics: less fuel firing
recommendation: Check for fuel flowability in firing line, clean firing line

name: Inefficient calcination in precalciner (less fuel firing, range)
diagnostics: less fuel firing
recommendation: Check for fuel flowability in firing line, clean firing line

name: Inefficient calcination in precalciner (over burning)
diagnostics: Over burning
recommendation: Reduce fuel

name: Kiln feed diverted
diagnostics: Kiln feeding stopped
recommendation: Kiln feed diverted

name: Kiln over filling
diagnostics: Kiln filling is high
recommendation: Reduce Kiln feed, increase kiln RPM

name: Kiln Main drive overload
diagnostics: High feed rate, Material accumulation
recommendation: Stabilize the feed, Plan schedule maintenance to remove deposits

name: Machine running above capacity
diagnostics: High feed rate, machine working at over capacity
recommendation: Stabilize the feed

name: Kiln Gear box high vibrations
diagnostics: Miss-alignment, lose bolts
recommendation: Inspect bearing defects, misalignment, inspect rotating parts

name: Kiln Gear box Lubrication system malfunctioning
diagnostics: Gear bearing will be heated up, starts the bearing wear.
recommendation: Check oil quality, pump cavitation, make-up lube oil

name: Kiln roller bearing temperature high
diagnostics: Roller bearing issue, Lubrication oil issue or Oil leakage, Circulating water system issue
recommendation: Inspect bearing defects, misalignment, inspect rotating parts, check and replace lubrication oil, check for circulating water flow

name: Kiln Firing System Malfunction Or Kiln Burner/flame malformation (too long/short, impingement)
diagnostics: Undesired temperature profile near the flame and end of the kiln
recommendation: Adjust the jet air blower speed according to the kiln temp, plan safe inspection to check the qulity of shell lining / refractory bricks

name: Kiln Firing Rate Fluctuation
diagnostics: Kiln firing rate fluctuation
recommendation: Check for fuel flowability in firing line, clean firing line

name: Kiln Firing Rate Fluctuation (low)
diagnostics: Kiln firing rate fluctuation
recommendation: Check for fuel flowability in firing line, clean firing line

name: Secondary air and Tertiary air temperature profile disturbance
diagnostics: Coal quality, Incomplete combustion, air-fuel imbalance
recommendation: Adjust fuel flow rate to kiln main burner and jet blower speed.

name: Kiln Inlet O2/ CO limit breach
diagnostics: Air ingress at kiln inlet, incomplete fuel combustion, false readings
recommendation: Possible leakages at preheater and Kiln inlet area, incomplete combustion of fuel,  faulty sensor

name: Low fuel efficiency
diagnostics: low feed rate and high fuel consumption
recommendation: Check and stabilize the Kiln feed and adjust the fuel supply

name: Preheater Exit temperature high_1
diagnostics: Low or uneven raw meal flow
recommendation: Adjust kiln feed

name: Preheater Exit temperature high_2
diagnostics: Poor calcination efficiency  (excess fuel is being fired)
recommendation: Reduce kiln fuel as per available margin

name: Preheater Exit temperature high_3
diagnostics: Excess air (fan / draft mismanagement)
recommendation: Adjust ID fan speed

name: Preheater Exit temperature high_4
diagnostics: Excessive false air ingress
recommendation: Inspect and arrest leakages

name: Preheater Exit temperature high_5
diagnostics: Poor cyclone heat exchange efficiency
recommendation: Clean cyclone build-up

name: String 1 Cyclone twin & 2nd heat transfer not proper_SCML_KILN
diagnostics: String 1 Cyclone twin & 2nd cyclone heat exchange is not proper, prabable cyclone/ preheater duct  material build-up.
recommendation:
Schedule online cleaning/ sootblowing for String 1 Cyclone twin & 2nd cyclone.
Inspect preheater ducts for deposits (use endoscope or thermal profile data).

name: String 2 Cyclone twin & 2nd heat transfer not proper_SCML_KILN
diagnostics: String 2 Cyclone twin & 2nd cyclone heat exchange is not proper, prabable cyclone/ preheater duct  material build-up.
recommendation:
Schedule online cleaning/ sootblowing for String 2 Cyclone twin & 2nd cyclone.
Inspect preheater ducts for deposits (use endoscope or thermal profile data).

name: String 1 Cyclone 1 & 2 Material Build-up/ Heat Transfer not proper
diagnostics: String 1 Cyclone 1 & 2 pressure-drop increase,  heat transfer not proper and high PH exit gas temperature indicates cyclone/ preheater duct  material build-up reducing heat exchange.
recommendation: Schedule online cleaning/ sootblowing for String 1 Cyclone 1 & 2.Inspect preheater ducts for deposits (use endoscope or thermal profile data).
